half-double_crochet skills/concepts include working in back loops and color changes notes from the designer keep it cozy with a thick sumptuous cowl create rich texture and shape with just three basic crochet stitches worked in back loops add stripes by changing colors every two row carrying unused colors up the side a single seam completes the circle or you can simply crochet the first and last row together with a larger circumference at the shoulders and a smaller circumference at the head this protective cone is reminiscent of the beautifully striated conical shells of conidae or cone snails * click here 5 to learn how to crochet this cowl * to adjust the cowl you may add or subtract repeats of row 2 and 3 ending on a row 3 * when changing colors carry unused color up the side
